transArray.content: Overall it's OK, the location is easy to find and the surrounding area is quiet. But it's not very clean. There is a hair on the table in the room in a conspicuous place.

Dear guest, thank you for your recognition of us. The hotel is located at Suzhouqiao Station of Metro Line 16. It has an excellent location and is adjacent to Haidian high-end communities and apartments, with a quiet environment. We sincerely apologize for the uncomfortable experience caused by the hygiene details, and have strengthened the training of employees on hygiene and ward rounds in the future work. We strive to improve our work and hope to have the opportunity to provide services for you next time you stay. A better stay experience.
